title: Royal Enfield forays into pre-owned bike biz with Reown
description: Royal Enfield has launched Reown, a pre-owned bike business initiative, allowing customers to buy, sell, exchange, and upgrade their motorcycles. The initiative aims to create easier access to ownership and upgrading, while ensuring trust and convenience. With a wide retail network and Enfield collectors, Reown will be available in Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata, Bangalore, and Chennai.
